Text: Updated September 27, 2021
Label: Updated Privacy Policy

Text: Information You May Choose to Provide to Us\nWe may collect information, including personal data, directly from you if you choose to provide that information. For example, you may provide us with your name and contact information (such as an email address), date of birth, or other details of that nature, when you sign up for our newsletters or participate in promotions or surveys on the Site.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: You also may choose to provide personally identifiable information about yourself when you participate in forums or discussions on the Site.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Cookies are small files that websites and other online services use to store information about users on the users’ own computers. This Site may use cookies (such as HTTP and HTML5 cookies, as well as other types of local storage.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: To manage our automatic data collection, we may place tags (often referred to as “web beacons”) on pages on the Site or in emails we send to you. Web beacons are small files that link web pages to particular web servers and their cookies, and they may be used for a variety of purposes, such as counting the number of visitors to the Site, analyzing how users navigate around the Site, assessing how many emails that we send are actually opened and which articles or links are viewed by visitors.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: How We May Share Information\n\nOur agents, vendors, consultants, and other service providers may have access to information we collect through the Site to carry out work on our behalf.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed
Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: Unsubscribe from emails. To unsubscribe from a particular newsletter, click the "unsubscribe" link at the bottom of that email newsletter.
Label: Description of Right to Opt-out of sale of PI

Text: If you would like to globally opt-out from ALL Investopedia email campaigns please send an email to optout@investopedia.com with "Unsubscribe" in the subject line.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: When we send newsletters to subscribers we may allow advertisers or partners to include messages in those newsletters, or we may send dedicated newsletters on behalf of those advertisers or partners.
Label: Description of Right to Opt-out of sale of PI

Text: How We’ll Inform You About Changes to This Privacy Policy\n\nWe may update this online privacy policy periodically to reflect changes to our privacy practices, such as how we collect or use personal data. If we propose to make any material changes, we will post a prominent notice on the investopedia.com home page to notify you of significant changes to this policy, and we indicate at the top of the policy the date when it was most recently updated. We encourage you to periodically review this page for the latest information on our privacy practices.
Label: Updated Privacy Policy

Text: We do not knowingly "sell" personal information that we collect from you, in accordance with the definition of "sell" in the CCPA, and will treat personal information we collect from you as subject to a do not sell request.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text: We will not discriminate against you in a manner prohibited by the CCPA because you exercise your CCPA rights.
Label: Description of Right to Non-discrimination on exercising rights

Text: We or our third-party partners may combine information that each of us collects automatically with other information about you, including information you choose to provide.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: This Site may use cookies (such as HTTP and HTML5 cookies, as well as other types of local storage.

Web beacons are small files that link web pages to particular web servers and their cookies, and they may be used for a variety of purposes, such as counting the number of visitors to the Site, analyzing how users navigate around the Site, assessing how many emails that we send are actually opened and which articles or links are viewed by visitors.

Text: Finally, companies that provide certain third-party apps, tools, widgets, and plug-ins that may appear on the Site (for example, Facebook “Like” buttons), also may use automated means to collect information regarding your interactions with these features.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected
Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: With our affiliates for internal business purposes;\nWith third parties for marketing purposes, including social media networks, data management platforms, and other advertising technology providers; for example, we may match your email address with third parties with whom you have also consented to share your email address and use such match to deliver custom offers or emails to you on the Sites and elsewhere online;
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text: With respect to analytics and statistical information, to inform advertisers about the nature of our user base;\nIn the event we sell or transfer all or a portion of our business or assets (including a reorganization, dissolution, or liquidation).
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text: In order to make such a request of us, please email us at privacy@investopedia.com.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: If you do choose to participate, please be aware that these features may be operated by a third party that is not controlled by Investopedia, and therefore the information you provide may be collected by the third party and subject to its privacy policy.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: We do not knowingly "sell" personal information that we collect from you, in accordance with the definition of "sell" in the CCPA, and will treat personal information we collect from you as subject to a do not sell request.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text: Please follow the instructions at our Consumer Rights Request page here and respond to any follow up inquiries we may make.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: You have the right to send us a request, no more than twice in a twelve-month period, for any of the following for the period that is twelve months prior to the request date:\n\nThe categories of PI we have collected about you.
Label: Description of Right to Know PI Collected

Text: The business or commercial purposes for our collecting or selling your PI.\nThe categories of third parties to whom we have shared your PI.
Label: Description of Right to Know PI sold / shared

Text: The specific pieces of PI we have collected about you.
Label: Description of Right to Know PI Collected

Text: A list of the categories of PI disclosed for a business purpose in the prior 12 months, or that no disclosure occurred.\nA list of the categories of PI sold about you in the prior 12 months, or that no sale occurred. If we sold your PI, we will explain:The categories of your PI we have sold.\nThe categories of third parties to which we sold PI, by categories of PI sold for each third party.
Label: Description of Right to Know PI sold / shared

Text: You have the right to make or obtain a transportable copy, no more than twice in a twelve-month period, of your PI that we have collected in the period that is 12 months prior to the request date and are maintaining.
Label: Description of Right to Know PI Collected

Text: Except to the extent we have a basis for retention under CCPA, you may request that we delete your PI that we have collected directly from you and are maintaining. Note also that we are not required to delete your PI that we did not collect directly from you.
Label: Description of Right to Delete

Text: You may alternatively exercise more limited control of your PI by instead exercising one of the following more limited opt-outs, including unsubscribing from email newsletters.
Label: Description of Right to Opt-out of sale of PI

Text: We will not discriminate against you in a manner prohibited by the CCPA because you exercise your CCPA rights. However, we may charge a different price or rate, or offer a different level or quality of good or service, to the extent that doing so is reasonably related to the value of the applicable data.
Label: Description of Right to Non-discrimination on exercising rights

Text: This Site may collect personal information from some Users.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Data Retention and Access\n\nWe will retain your personal data only for as long as necessary for the purposes it was retained, such as to enable you to use the Website and your products or to provide services to you. In some instances, we may retain data for longer periods in order to comply with applicable laws (including those regarding document retention), resolve disputes with any parties, and otherwise as necessary to allow us to conduct our business.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: In order to make such a request of us, please email us at privacy@investopedia.com.

Text: We do not knowingly "sell" personal information that we collect from you, in accordance with the definition of "sell" in the CCPA, and will treat personal information we collect from you as subject to a do not sell request.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text: There is not yet a consensus as to whether third-party cookies and tracking devices associated with our websites and mobile apps may constitute a "sale" of your PI as defined by the CCPA.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Sold

Text: Some personal information we maintain about Consumers is not sufficiently associated with enough personal information about the Consumer for us to be able to verify that it is a particular Consumer's personal information (e.g., clickstream data tied only to a pseudonymous browser ID). As required by the CCPA, we do not include that personal information in response to Verifiable Consumer Requests.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: We will not discriminate against you in a manner prohibited by the CCPA because you exercise your CCPA rights. However, we may charge a different price or rate, or offer a different level or quality of good or service, to the extent that doing so is reasonably related to the value of the applicable data. In addition, we may offer you financial incentives for the collection, sale and retention and use of your PI as permitted by the CCPA that can, without limitation, result in reasonably different prices, rates, or quality levels.
Label: Description of Right to Non-discrimination on exercising rights
